issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

how would sell a desktop appcelerator app? I'd like people to download trial/limited version of the app, and once they register, enter key they get fully functional product.

I probably would like to be able to customize the process. I don't want to end up in a situation where if one Appcelerator app gets cracked, all Appcelerator apps can be cracked automatically because they all use the same, out of the box licensing scheme.

I probably want to avoid activation, since it usually creates more problems than I want to handle, at least in a small app.

any thoughts?

{html}
fields.summary: add support to make app shareware (through licensing/keys)

comments.body:
{html}

this is a more generic question that can be directed at our new Q/A site:
http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions

{html}
